cast.name: 莫妮卡·兰达利 Mónica Randall
Mariano Vidal Molina Mariano Vidal Molina
何塞·曼努埃尔·马丁 José Manuel Martín

writer.name: 迪克·韦恩·萨莫斯 Dirk Wayne Summers
伯纳德·C·舍恩菲尔德 Bernard C. Schoenfeld
何塞·安东尼奥·德拉·洛马 José Antonio de la Loma

introduction: Guy Madison (TV's Wild Bill Hickok) leads a 'who's who' Italian/Spanish Western cast in this tale about killing and revenge. Jim Lattimer is one of the few men who will stand up to the local town despot Josua Gonzalez (Vassili Karamesinis) and his two brothers. After Jim is killed and his young son is kidnapped, his wife Rosita (Monica Randall) mourns her loss for three long years, until a group of five gunfighters led by Tex (Guy Madison) comes to town to offer Rosita a chance to get her revenge, reclaim her lost son and rid the town of Gonzalez's tyranny.The film boasts a plethora of Spaghetti Western mainstays, with the likes of Jose Manuel Martin ('I Want Him Dead', 'Forgotten Pistolero', 'Pistol for Ringo'), Vassili Karamesinis ('He Was Called Holy Ghost', Return of Sabata', 'Scalps') and Mariano Vidal Molina ('Gentleman Killer', 'Reverend Colt', 'My Colt, Not Yours').
